page.title: 06 A Day in My Family Life
page.content:
When I wake up at 7.40 my mum is down stairs making my Weetabix and coffee. My mum gets up at 6.30 because my dad goes to work at 7.30 and she makes his sandwiches. My dad works as a foreman in a factory called "Girlings", where they make brakes for cars and lorries. My mum does not go out to work. My brother and I go to school where we have Project-Maths and Englsh.We go home for dinner. After dinner sometimes we have games. The boys play football or baseball while the girls have netball or rounders, depending on the season. School finishes at 3.30. I go home and watch television until my father comes home, then we all have tea.
Written by{Neil James (Oakfield)
